text: Reluctant Bride, also known as Two Grooms for a Bride, is a 1955 British comedy movie directed by Henry Cass and starring John Carroll, Virginia Bruce, Brian Oulton, Kay Callard, Arthur Lowe. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Cass
title: Reluctant Bride
